sentences.en: England and Wales are not unusually murderous ( see chart ).
sentences.cn: 英格兰和威尔士是犯罪高发的地区 ( 见图表 ).

sentences.en: He is a murderous devil - I never could - I - I'm afraid of him!
sentences.cn: 他是个杀人不眨眼的魔鬼 -- 我决不能 -- 我 -- 我怕他!

sentences.en: He made a murderous attack on his wife that evening.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上他想致妻子于死地。

sentences.en: I couldn't withstand the murderous heat.
Like men we'll face the murderous, cowardly pack.
sentences.cn: 我们就像对着一群胆小的谋杀者一样.

sentences.en: She surprised the secret of his murderous past through a stolen letter.
sentences.cn: 她从偷来的一封信中意外地发现了他从前杀过人的秘密.

sentences.en: That scoundrel harbored a murderous heart.
The guy steered him into murderous desires.
sentences.cn: 那个家伙说服了他,让他想行凶.

sentences.en: The leading companies recoiled from the murderous crossfire from the pillboxes.
sentences.cn: 先头部队受到掩体中交叉火力的攻击而撤退.

sentences.en: The murderous rages of the Fontaines had made County history long before this chapter had opened.
sentences.cn: 方丹家族中那种危险的狂暴性格在本县历史上早就闻名了.

sentences.en: They are then likely to return to their simmeringly murderous tribal ways.
sentences.cn: 那时,他们可能会回到他们凶杀频频的部落生活方式.

sentences.en: This made me colder and more murderous than ever.
sentences.cn: 这使我变得更冷静,也更凶狠.

sentences.en: This murderous lunatic could kill them both without a second thought.
sentences.cn: 这个杀人狂会不假思索地把他们两个都杀掉。

sentences.en: We detest with horror the duplicity and villainy of the murderous hyenas of Bukharinite wreckers.
sentences.cn: 我们非常憎恨布哈林那帮两面三刀、杀人破坏,干尽坏事的豺狼.

sentences.en: Who built the White Sea canal [ Stalin's single most murderous slave - labour project ]?
sentences.cn: 是谁建了 白海运河 (草菅人命的斯大林下令劳改犯修建的一项工事 )?

words.tran_cn: 杀人的，残忍的；凶残的；蓄意谋杀的

trans.tran_cn: 蓄意谋杀的，杀人的，残忍的，凶残的
trans.tran_en: Someone who is murderous is likely to murder someone and may already have murdered someone
